snippet.title: Decadent Heir — Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Rewrite history in this narrative RPG set in the last days of Imperial Russia. Born into nobility, you will shape both your destiny and the fate of a nation.Will you preserve the old order, ignite the flames of revolution, or carve out your own path? Every decision will echo through time.

Try the demo on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3261140/Decadent_Heir/

#gaming
